extension.summary: Tvheadend: a TV streaming server for Linux
extension.description: Tvheadend (7e1dac8): is a TV streaming server for Linux supporting DVB-S/S2, DVB-C, DVB-T/T2, IPTV, SAT>IP, ATSC and ISDB-T
extension.summary: Tvheadend: un servidor de transmisión de TV para Linux
extension.description: Tvheadend (7e1dac8): es un servidor de transmisión de TV para Linux compatible DVB-S/S2, DVB-C, DVB-T/T2, IPTV, SAT>IP, ATSC y ISDB-T
extension.news:
101 - update gnutls to 3.6.14
100 - initial CoreELEC version
